name: Cateroid
description:
Submission for Scribblejam. I make a simple game about alien cat avoid asteroids. The challenge is all text must be a made up language so I use Icon instead and also trying with other challenges too such as never stop, keyboard broken, No design, and 2 bit color. If you play this on a smartphone the screen is not scaled properly. I'll fix it later.

How to play :

  • Click a mouse and move up or down to avoid asteroids. Also, work with touchscreen

Game, art, music, font, and SFX are made by me.

Software used:

  • Godot engine
  • Adobe illustrator
  • FL studio
  • Bfxr
